text: jis din kapataachaaree purush aur kapataachaaree striyaan mominon se kahengee, "tanik hamaaree pratiksha karo. ham bhee tumhaare prakaash me se kuchh prakaash le len!" kaha jaega, "apane peechhe laut jao. phir prakaash talaash karo!" itane mein unake beech ek deevaar khadee kar dee jaegee, jisamen ek dvaar hoga. usake bheetar ka haal yah hoga ki usamen dayaaluta hogee aur usake baahar ka yah ki us or se yaatana hogee
